毾字的基本解释

毾
tà
〔毾??（
d卬g ）〕有花纹的细毛毯，如“又有细布、好毾毾。”

毾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tà］
［《廣韻》吐盍切，入盍，透。］
见“毾”、“毾”。

毾字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【毛字部】　毾； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页595第19
【唐韻】吐盍切【集韻】託盍切，?音榻。【說文】毾㲪也。【後漢·西域傳】天竺國有細布、好毾㲪。【註】埤蒼曰：毛席也。【釋名】施之承大牀前小榻上，登以上牀也。【班固·與弟超書】月支毾大小相雜，但細好而已。【正字通】中天竺有毾㲪，今曰氆氌，秦、蜀之邊有之，似褐，五色方錦。廣中洋舶亦有至者。又名多羅羢。　或作?，非。

毾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
毾字的起名意思

暂无。

毾
Basic explanation of words
毾
tà
〔毾?? (
d卬g)] fine woolen blankets with patterns, such as "there are fine cloths, and it's so beautiful."
毾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tà］
["Guangyun" cuts into the spit, enters the spit, and penetrates. ]
See "毾", "毾".
毾
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Mao Character Department] 　毾; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 595 19
【Tang Yun】Turn and cut 【Jiyun】Take the tongue and cut it, sound couch. [Said the text] 毾㲪 also. [Later Han · Western Regions Biography] Tianzhu has fine cloth and good 毾㲪. [Note] Pi Cang said: Mao Xi also. [Release name] Shi Zhicheng is on the small couch in front of the big bed, and also on the upper bed. [Ban Gu · Chaoshu with Brother] The size of the monthly branches are mixed, but they are fine. [Zhengzitong] In the middle of Tianzhu there is 毾㲪, today is 氆氇, there is it on the side of Qin and Shu, it looks like brown, five-color square brocade. There are also those from Guangzhong Yangbo. Also known as Duoluorong.　Or do?, no.
